title: Public transport for the A League Round 9: Saturday 21 December 2024
articleContent:
Experience the thrill of the 2024-25 A-League season at AAMI Park as Melbourne Victory takes on Melbourne City. 

Extra services will help you get to and from AAMI Park on Saturday 21 December 2024. 

The event will begin at 7.35pm. 

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Return service from Richmond Station:

  • Ringwood leaving 9:58pm and 10:10pm from Platform 9 
  • Glen Waverley leaving at 9:59pm and 10:06pm from Platform 10 
  • Dandenong leaving at 9:51pm and 10:04pm from Platform 6 
  • Frankston leaving at 10:14pm from Platform 4 
  • Cheltenham leaving at 9:55pm from Platform 4 
  • Sandringham leaving 9:54pm from Platform 2 

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Route 70

  • Trams will operate from Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street (Stop 4) and Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.  

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan bus

Customers can catch the following buses close to AAMI Park:

  • Route 246

Please note, services may terminate prior to the end of the match.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Regional train

Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
